message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm making the first move.
Okay, my turn. Let's split the difference from your offer, but in my favor. This seems fair since you get the first offer in round 3 if we don't agree now.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'll take a little less than my initial offer, but I need you to meet me halfway here. It's better to agree now than lose more to inflation.
